src:
MotoGP Malaysia: Quartararo Pole, Marquez Kecelakaan
02 Nov 2019, 15:01 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Fabio Quartararo pole position di MotoGP Malaysia. (TOSHIFUMI KITAMURA / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Fabio Quartararo memastikan pole position pada kualifikasi MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Internasional Sepang, Sabtu (2/11) siang WIB.Pebalap Petronas Yamaha tersebut berhasil mencatatkan waktu 1 menit 58,303 detik. Dia lebih cepat 0,103 detik dari Maverick Vinales yang berada di posisi kedua.Posisi start ketiga diraih oleh Franco Morbidelli dengan selisih 0,129 detik dari Quartararo.Sementara itu, juara dunia MotoGP 2019 Marc Marquez sempat terjatuh pada kualifikasi dua (Q2) MotoGP Malaysia. Marquez terpelanting ke luar trek di Tikungan 2 saat sisa dua menit lagi.



The Baby Alien tampaknya mengalami masalah pada saat pengereman sehingga motornya terlempar ke luar. Alhasil, Marquez harus puas di posisi start ke-11.Rekan Vinales di Yamaha, Valentino Rossi, harus puas berada di posisi keenam dengan selisih waktu 0,694 detik dari pebalap tercepat, Quartararo.



Live streaming balapan MotoGP Malaysia 2019, Minggu (3/11), dapat disaksikan di CNNIndonesia.com. Sementara siaran langsung MotoGP Malaysia 2019 dapat diikuti di Trans7.Hasil 10 Besar Kualifikasi MotoGP Malaysia1. Fabio Quartararo Petronas Yamaha 2. Maverick Viñales Monster Yamaha (YZR-M1)3. Franco Morbidelli Petronas Yamaha (YZR-M1)4. Jack Miller Pramac Ducati (GP19)5. Cal Crutchlow LCR Honda (RC213V)6. Valentino Rossi Monster Yamaha (YZR-M1)7. Alex Rins Suzuki Ecstar (GSX-RR)8. Danilo Petrucci Ducati Team (GP19)9. Johann Zarco LCR Honda (RC213V)10. Andrea Dovizioso Ducati Team (GP19) (bac/jal)
text:
Malaysian MotoGP: Quartararo Pole, Marquez Accident
02 Nov 2019, 15:01 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Fabio Quartararo pole position in MotoGP Malaysia. (TOSHIFUMI KITAMURA / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Fabio Quartararo ensured pole position in the Malaysian MotoGP qualification at Sepang International Circuit, Saturday (2/11) afternoon WIB. The Yamaha Petronas rider managed to record a time of 1 minute 58.303 seconds. He is 0.103 seconds faster than Maverick Vinales who came in second. The third starting position was achieved by Franco Morbidelli with a difference of 0.129 seconds from Quartaro.In the meantime, 2019 MotoGP world champion Marc Marquez had fallen in qualifying two (Q2) MotoGP Malaysia. Marquez bounced off the track at Bend 2 with two minutes to go.



The Baby Alien seems to have a problem when braking so that the motor was thrown out. As a result, Marquez had to settle for 11th starting position. Vinales' colleague at Yamaha, Valentino Rossi, had to settle for sixth place with a time difference of 0.694 seconds from the fastest rider, Quartararo.



Live streaming of the 2019 Malaysian MotoGP race on Sunday (3/11), can be watched on CNNIndonesia.com. While Malaysia 2019 MotoGP live broadcasts can be followed on Trans7. Results of the Top 10 Malaysian MotoGP Qualifications1 Fabio Quartararo Petronas Yamaha 2. Maverick Viñales Monster Yamaha (YZR-M1) 3. Franco Morbidelli Petronas Yamaha (YZR-M1) 4. Jack Miller Pramac Ducati (GP19) 5. Cal Crutchlow LCR Honda (RC213V) 6. Valentino Rossi Monster Yamaha (YZR-M1) 7. Alex Rins Suzuki Ecstar (GSX-RR) 8. Danilo Petrucci Ducati Team (GP19) 9. Johann Zarco LCR Honda (RC213V) 10. Andrea Dovizioso Ducati Team (GP19) (bac / jal)
